remarks: Function-builder for derivative: expand the function from an open set to its closure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvmptntr.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
dvmptntr.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ S ) $.
dvmptntr.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptntr.j $e |- J = ( K |`t S ) $.
dvmptntr.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvmptntr.i $e |- ( ph -> ( ( int ` J ) ` X ) = Y ) $.
dvmptntr $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( S _D ( x e. Y |-> A ) ) ) $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
